MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L9 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Ormskirk Road and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the location and repairs of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by generator by 10:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:13AM on 22nd January 2021.
